hi :wave:  I'm reading <@U01PJMZ5KPH> post about sending app to submission (:pray: thank you for this detailed explanation) and I have doubts about point no 2.
_Please check for the minimum requirement of Installation before submitting an App to get approval from HubSpot...probably the installation could should be > 3_
What does it mean? How is it counted? I've installed my app from developer account on few HubSpot instances (3 are HubSpot Production and 2 are test accounts) but I see "1 total installs" in the Listing details tab. Does anyone know what cause the problem? It's app for integration.

Hi <@U02FA8KJABS>,

The app requires to get installed at least 3 different HubSpot accounts. The registered mail id of each HubSpot account should be different and probably be hosted on a company domain (not a Gmail, etc.).

For example, If you connect 3 different HubSpot accounts registered with the same mail ID, it may count as 1.

To verify app installation, please visit section Settings -> Integrations -> Connected Apps in each connected HubSpot account. Your app should be listed here if installed in that particular HubSpot account. Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi <@U01PJMZ5KPH> I'd like to get some clarification on that requirement as we have installed the app with a different corporate domain and the number of installations didn't update. What's the reason on that requirement and how we should get the installations when the app is not listed on the marketplace. It just doesn't make sense to me.
Can you please confirm if you are able to see your App in settings section in every HubSpot account as Installed?
